ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.9 on 2024-07-27T21:43:57 [Issue ID 4000-467115] urn:comicvine:4000-467115
ComicInfo.Summary:
With Prog 1901, the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic continues its universe-shattering line-up specially designed for new and lapsed readers with second instalments of Judge Dredd: Block Judge by John Wagner and Carlos Ezquerra, Kingdom: Aux Drift by Dan Abnett, Richard Elson and Abigail Ryder, and Stickleback: The Thru’Penny Opera by Ian Edginton and D'Israeli. Meanwhile, The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (And The Dead Left In His Wake) by Rob Williams and Mike Dowling continues its dread tale, with Ichabod standing on the shores of the River Stix, his final hope in ruins – but what will he do next? And 2000 AD’s creator Pat Mills returns with John Higgins and Sally Hurst for the new series of his dark and nasty ‘superspy’ saga, Greysuit.
Cover: Nick Percival
Judge Dredd - Block Judge (Part Two) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)Stickleback - The Thru'Penny Opera (Part Two) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)Greysuit - Prince of Darkness (Part One) (Pat Mills - John Higgins)The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (And the Dead Left In His Wake) - One Last Bullet (Part One) (Rob Williams - Michael Dowling)Kingdom - Aux Drift (Part Two) (Dan Abnett - Richard Elson)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1901
